sentences.en: A purple intemetallic phase ( called purple plaque ) is commonly found in bonding.
sentences.cn: 键合中常能发现一种紫色的 金属化合物,称为紫斑.

sentences.en: A simple plaque marks the spot where the martyr died.
sentences.cn: 有一块素的饰板用以纪念该烈士的殉难处.

sentences.en: After touring the hospital, Her Majesty unveiled a commemorative plaque.
sentences.cn: 女王陛下巡视完这家医院后，为纪念匾揭了幕。

sentences.en: Deposits of plaque build up between the tooth and the gum.
sentences.cn: 牙齿和牙龈之间会滋生牙斑。

sentences.en: If the plaque breaks open, a clot forms, choking off the supply of blood.
sentences.cn: 如果这种斑块破裂, 栓塞便形成了, 于是阻抑血液供应.

sentences.en: It is necessary to remove plaque by brushing one's teeth.
On one side of the main entrance there's a red plaque.
sentences.cn: 大门口的一侧有块红色的匾额。

sentences.en: Some Latin words were engraved on the plaque.
The local historical society put up a plaque at the site of the battle.
sentences.cn: 当地的历史学会在战场所在地树立了牌匾.

sentences.en: The Queen unveiled a commemorative plaque.
The Queen unveiled a plaque to mark the official opening of the hospital.
sentences.cn: 女王主持揭幕式，标志着医院正式启用。

sentences.en: The teacher training college put up a plaque to the college's founder.
sentences.cn: 那所教师培训学院为该学院的创立者立了一块纪念牌匾。

sentences.en: The team’s coach was given a plaque.
sentences.cn: 那个队的教练得到一块匾牌。

sentences.en: The toothbrush gently removes plaque without damaging the gums.
sentences.cn: 这种牙刷可以温和去除牙菌斑而不损伤牙龈。

sentences.en: There is a commemorative plaque to the artist in the village hall.
sentences.cn: 村公所里有一块纪念该艺术家的牌匾.

sentences.en: When not removed, plaque causes tooth decay and gum disease.
sentences.cn: 牙斑如果不清除就会导致牙齿蛀蚀和牙龈疾病。

phrases.tran_cn: 粥样斑块；动脉粥样硬化斑块

trans.tran_cn: （金属或石质的） 匾额，匾牌，牙斑，牙菌斑，斑块
trans.tran_en: a piece of flat metal, wood, or stone with writing on it, used as a prize in a competition or attached to a building to remind people of an event or person
